description: Java class representing a data transfer object (DTO) for updating or partially updating a Todo item in a task tracker application. Contains optional fields such as title, description, completion status, and due date with validation constraints.

classes.name: TodoUpdateRequest
classes.description: DTO class for updating a Todo item, with optional fields and validation annotations.

methods.name: getTitle
methods.description: Returns the title of the Todo.

methods.name: setTitle
methods.description: Sets the title of the Todo.

methods.name: getDescription
methods.description: Returns the description of the Todo.

methods.name: setDescription
methods.description: Sets the description of the Todo.

methods.name: getCompleted
methods.description: Returns the completion status of the Todo.

methods.name: setCompleted
methods.description: Sets the completion status of the Todo.

methods.name: getDueDate
methods.description: Returns the due date of the Todo.

methods.name: setDueDate
methods.description: Sets the due date of the Todo.
